author: Bellular News
description:
More than 30 Rockstar staff fired for "gross misconduct"—the union says it's retaliation for trying to unionize, and they're taking legal action.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!

00:00 30+ Staff Fired Before GTA 6
01:03 "Union Busting" vs "Gross Misconduct"
03:03 The Union Isn't Backing Down
04:25 "Gross Misconduct"
07:26 Rockstar WAS Getting Better
10:21 The Fallout
